content: The technology business, which is our product business, generated in the first quarter 2023, $3.8 million in sales at the constant exchange rate versus $4.1 million in sales versus $3.8 million in the first quarter of 2022. Notable, however, is that within the mix of sales of this segment versus the products business, equipment sales were $2.15 million in the first quarter 2023 compared to $1.9 million in the quarter 2022, representing a 31% increase in equipment sales.
